storyTitle: As Employee, I want to securely log in to the schedule system to protect my personal data

testCases.title: Validate successful SSO login and schedule access
preconditions: Employee has been provisioned in the system

steps.action: Navigate to schedule system login page
steps.expectedResult: User is automatically redirected to corporate SSO portal login page

steps.action: Enter valid corporate username and password on SSO portal
steps.expectedResult: Credentials are accepted by SSO portal

steps.action: Submit authentication form
steps.expectedResult: User is redirected back to schedule system and logged in successfully with welcome message displayed

steps.action: Access personal schedule page from navigation menu
steps.expectedResult: Personal schedule page loads successfully displaying employee's schedule data

steps.action: Verify user session is active by checking session indicator
steps.expectedResult: User name and active session indicator are displayed in header

postconditions: Employee is authenticated and logged into the system
Login attempt is logged in audit trail with timestamp and user details

testCases.title: Verify session timeout after inactivity
preconditions: Employee is logged into the schedule system
Session timeout is configured to 15 minutes

steps.action: Log in to the schedule system using valid SSO credentials
steps.expectedResult: User is successfully logged in and schedule page is accessible

steps.action: Note the current time and remain inactive (no clicks, no keyboard input) for exactly 15 minutes
steps.expectedResult: No user activity is detected by the system during this period

steps.action: After 15 minutes of inactivity, observe the system behavior
steps.expectedResult: Session expires automatically and user is logged out with a session timeout notification message

steps.action: Attempt to access the personal schedule page by clicking on schedule link or entering URL directly
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied and user is redirected to the login page with message indicating session has expired

steps.action: Verify that session cookies and tokens have been cleared
steps.expectedResult: No valid session tokens exist in browser storage or cookies

postconditions: User is logged out of the system
Session timeout event is logged in audit trail

testCases.title: Ensure unauthorized access is blocked
preconditions: User is not logged into the schedule system

steps.action: Open browser and directly navigate to the schedule page URL without logging in
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied immediately

steps.action: Observe system response
steps.expectedResult: User is automatically redirected to the login page with message indicating authentication is required

steps.action: Verify that no schedule data is displayed or accessible
steps.expectedResult: No sensitive schedule information is visible or retrievable

steps.action: Check browser developer tools for any exposed session tokens or data
steps.expectedResult: No valid session tokens or sensitive data are present

steps.action: Verify unauthorized access attempt is logged
steps.expectedResult: Failed access attempt is recorded in audit log with timestamp and attempted URL

postconditions: No access to schedule data is granted
Unauthorized access attempt is logged in audit trail

storyTitle: As Employee, I want to log out securely to protect my schedule information

testCases.title: Validate successful logout and session termination
preconditions: Employee is logged into the schedule system
Active session exists with valid session token
Logout button is visible and accessible
User is on any page within the schedule system

steps.action: Locate the logout button in the application header or navigation menu
steps.expectedResult: Logout button is visible and clickable

steps.action: Click the logout button
steps.expectedResult: User session is immediately terminated and user is redirected to the login page

steps.action: Verify logout confirmation message is displayed
steps.expectedResult: Message confirming successful logout is shown on login page

steps.action: Check browser cookies and session storage for session tokens
steps.expectedResult: All session cookies and tokens are cleared and no longer present

steps.action: Click browser back button to attempt returning to schedule page
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied and user remains on login page or is redirected back to login page

steps.action: Attempt to access the personal schedule page by entering the URL directly in browser
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied and user is redirected to login page with authentication required message

steps.action: Verify that schedule data is not accessible without re-authentication
steps.expectedResult: No schedule information is displayed and system requires login to proceed

steps.action: Check that logout action is logged in audit trail
steps.expectedResult: Logout event is recorded with timestamp and user details in system logs

postconditions: All session cookies and tokens are cleared
User is on the login page
User cannot access any protected pages without re-authentication
Logout event is logged in audit trail
